item.title: Trump Twitter Analysis - Part 1
item.description: Upon learning about Trump twitter archive, I immediately recognised the opportunity to subject the Presidentâ€™s tweets to some analysis. Without doubt President Trump, before many other politicians, understood the power of Twitter as a means of disseminating his message. His message has many characteristic features. Perhaps this is not surprising given the President’s former career as a reality television star. One phrase from the election campaign that stood out to me, an uninformed observer from outside the US, was ‘Crooked Hillary’.
